element.name: Tregolani Homebrew Collection
element.description:
This is a collection of personal homebrew created by Tregolani for DnD campaigns. Currently included in the collection are:

  • Items: Cursed Amulet of the Chameleon
  • Spells:
    • Cantrips: shockbolt
    • 2nd-level: freezing lance
    • 3rd-level: storm conduit
    • 4th-level: sonic boom
  • Classes: Sorcerer (Revised)
  • Subclasses: Sea Sorcery (Revised)
